experience.title: Intern
experience.description: • Worked with a team to build an interactive online platform for end-to-end Data Analytics solutions using Machine Learning algorithms.• Implemented Python code at the backend to enable amateurs to easily work with machine learning models such as Regression Analysis, Classification Algorithms, Text Analytics , Data Visualizations, Data Mining and Descriptive Statistics.• Developed deep understanding of Reliability Engineering and built model to predict survival probability based on failure analysis.

experience.title: Industrial Trainee
experience.description: • Successfully completed project on Boiler Operation and Turbine Overview, and gained practical insights about processes involved.• Comprehended knowledge related to Coal Mill, Boiler, Pumps, Heaters, Fans, Turbine System, Condenser and Cooling Towers.
